link.name: West of the USA (2000)
link.description: A 4-week trip to New York and some of the western states of the USA, with Micha, Psycho and Uli.

link.name: Taiwan (2001)
link.description: A 2-week visit to my friend Anne, who was a lecturer in Taiwan at that time.

link.name: Scotland (2002)
link.description: A 10-day trip through Scotland with David and Psycho.

link.name: Stockholm (2003)
link.description: One-day visit to Stockholm, seeing Elin who was doing her thesis project at the KTH at that time.
